attributes.action: The Union Jack and the St George flags to be flown every where that’s allowed ..
attributes.additional_details: I would like the British government to allow the St George flag and the Union Jack flag to be flown all over the United Kingdom to show our beacon of hope and light and bring peace love and harmony to our nation I would like all walks of life that loves our nation to be proud of our nation flags the St George flag and the Union Jack flag the flags of our nation will beings everyone together every community in every part of the United Kingdom .. we should be proud of our two flags not ashamed ..
attributes.background: I would like the British government to allow the Union Jack and the St George flags to be allowed to be put up every public place and every government buildings throughout the United Kingdom Union Jack is our identity and a symbol of hope and light for our nation bringing everyone together in the uk

rejection.details: There are no laws prohibiting the display of the St. George's Flag or the Union Flag/Union Jack
